sub_title: Imaging Cardiologist at University Medical Center Utrecht & Haga Teaching Hospital The Hague - PhD Candidate at Utrecht University -EACVI Certification and Accreditation Committee member
summary:
Multimodality Imaging Cardiologist. Skilled in clinical cardiology, transthoracic and transesophageal echocardiography, cardiac MRI, cardiac CT, and clinical research. 
EACVI accreditation in transthoracic,  transesophageal echocardiography, cardiovascular MR imaging (level 3), and cardiac CT (level 3).  Fellow of the European Association of Cardiovascular Imaging (FEACVI).  Fellow of the Society of Cardiovascular CT (FSCCT). 
Past Chairman of the CT&Nuclear Working Group of the Italian Society of Cardiology (SIC)

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=MARCO+GUGLIELMO
